mapper.insert: insert into bora_members (id, pw, name, nick, phone, email) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select * from bora_members where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update bora_members set pw=#{pw}, nick=#{nick}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from bora_members order by regdate
